name: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story
description: A small-town boy rises to become one of India’s greatest cricket captains through sheer determination and grit.

name: Sir (Vaathi)
description: A passionate teacher fights for quality education in a corrupt system that exploits students, sparking reform across schools.

name: The Great Indian Kitchen
description: A newlywed woman’s silent rebellion against patriarchal routines in a traditional Kerala household is both powerful and eye-opening.

name: Shabash Mithu
description: Biopic of Indian cricketer Mithali Raj, chronicling her struggles and achievements in shaping women's cricket in India.

name: Udaan
description: Inspired by GR Gopinath’s story, a man fights social norms and corporate hurdles to launch India’s first low-cost airline.

name: Chhichhore
description: A group of college friends reunite to support a friend's son through academic pressure, sharing stories of friendship and resilience.

name: Iqbal
description: A deaf and mute boy dreams of becoming a cricketer, defying all odds with help from an unlikely mentor.

name: Neerja
description: Flight attendant Neerja Bhanot sacrifices her life to save passengers during a hijacking, based on a true act of bravery.

name: Manjhi: The Mountain Man
description: Dashrath Manjhi carves a path through a mountain for 22 years after losing his wife—based on an incredible true story.

name: Rock On!!
description: Four friends reunite to pursue their musical dreams, rediscovering passion and friendship in mid-life crises.

name: Lakshya
description: A directionless young man joins the Indian Army and transforms into a courageous hero during the Kargil War.

name: Pad Man
description: Inspired by the life of Arunachalam Muruganantham, a man revolutionizes menstrual hygiene in rural India against all odds.
cast: Akshay Kumar, Radhika Apte, Sonam Kapoor

name: English Vinglish
description: A homemaker’s journey to self-respect begins when she secretly joins an English class while visiting New York.

name: Gunjan Saxena: The Kargil Girl
description: The inspiring story of India’s first female combat pilot who served during the Kargil War, breaking gender barriers in the Air Force.

name: Panga
description: A retired kabaddi player and mother tries to return to the sport, challenging age and gender roles.

name: The Sky Is Pink
description: Based on a real family’s story of love and resilience while dealing with their daughter's terminal illness.
cast: Priyanka Chopra, Farhan Akhtar, Zaira Wasim

name: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
description: The life of athlete Milkha Singh, his trauma of Partition, and his transformation into an international sports legend.

name: Mary Kom
description: From humble beginnings, Mary Kom fights her way to become a world boxing champion and national icon.

name: Anbe Sivam
description: A chance journey between two strangers opens up philosophical discussions on life, pain, love, and humanism.

name: 12th Fail
description: Based on a real UPSC topper, this story tracks an underprivileged boy’s journey of courage, failure, and resilience.

name: Jay Bhim
description: A tribal man’s wrongful arrest sparks a legal battle championed by a determined lawyer fighting caste injustice.

name: Raat Akeli Hai
description: A small-town cop investigates a powerful family in a murder mystery that also touches on dignity and social justice.

name: Salaam Bombay!
description: A heartbreaking yet inspiring tale of street children surviving the chaos of Mumbai, told with realism and compassion.

name: The White Tiger
description: A poor driver uses cunning and survival instincts to break free from India’s crushing caste system and poverty trap.
cast: Adarsh Gourav, Priyanka Chopra, Rajkummar Rao

name: The Theory of Everything
description: A powerful story of physicist Stephen Hawking’s life, love, and fight against ALS while revolutionizing our understanding of the universe.

name: The Blind Side
description: A homeless African-American teenager is adopted by a white family, discovering his talent in football and transforming his life.

name: Freedom Writers
description: A young teacher in a racially divided school uses writing and empathy to inspire her at-risk students to rise above violence and prejudice.

name: Soul Surfer
description: After a shark attack leaves her without an arm, young surfer Bethany Hamilton fights back to continue surfing and inspire the world.

name: Dead Poets Society
description: An English teacher inspires his students through poetry, challenging them to think independently and seize the day—'Carpe Diem'.
